text: Well, I'm a software engineering student. I was always a brillant student in my class. I have studied in a hight school for seven years. Yet when i passed my baccalaureat, i had an accident. So, I didn't graduade with a good average that allows me to do my dream job. I was so chocked and depressed. Nobody could talk to me in that period. I struggled a lot. I cried day and night. It was really like a nightmare for me untill this time. I didn't know what i'm going to choose as a specialization. Then one day, i met my brother's friend. He's a Data Science engineer in the Paris. He's a very successful person in his carrer. He didn't stop to talk to me and encourage me to do another job. He talked a lot about himself and his job. I remember that I was so impressive and fascinated by him. I loved his encouragments and enthusiasm about his work. Suddenlly, day after day, i changed my opinion and decided to study software. I moved to Paris. I get my diploma and i loved my studies. I was so grateful for him.Then, i decided to continue my studies as a software engineerieng in Paris. I did the campus procedure. I passed an interview and it was succcefull. I was accepted and here i'm in the right place. I succeded my first year which was so tricky for me. But finally, i did it. I enjoy staying in Paris. I enjoyed travelling to so many foreign countries and discovering new places and new cultures. By the end, I don't regret any decision taken.  I'm so happy for what I'm and what I achieved.
